calculate_statistics¶

evaluate.postprocessor.calculate_statistics.calculate_statistics(results: list[dict], times: int) → dict¶

Calculate the mean over all simulation results.

Parameters:

  • results (list[dict]) – A list of dictionaries containing simulation results.

  • times (int) – Number of conversations in the simulation

Returns:

A dictionary containing aggregated time series data for each agent.

Return type:

dict

evaluate.postprocessor.calculate_statistics.initialise_time_series(times: int) → dict¶

Initialize a time series structure for agent simulation data.
